__e: He was all I had and I loved him.
I believe that you loved him very much and you blame yourself for his death.
There are a million. trillion things I want to say but all I can say is, I love her so.
I know how much you loved him and I know it will never be the same.
I had thought I loved and understood your mother, but only then did I understand her and love her, and understand you all, and love you all.
I didn't make any formal proposal, Harry. I told her I loved her and she said she was not worthy to be my wife. -"Not worthy."
No one asked if I wanted a new mother. No one even asked me if I liked her.
I don't know why, perhaps because I liked him.
He was my husband and I loved him very much.

You wouldn't stay so calm. He has disappeared.

Uh, they tell him i ran off, i took the baby, i don't love him.
